summary: Corporate, professional, mobile-responsive solar energy website for GKV Smart Energy (India), modeled after nspg.in structure, with 5 core pages (Home, About, Services, Projects/Portfolio, Contact), SEO-friendly content, and a clean green/blue solar theme.
architectural_notes: Site modeled after the structure/layout/content style of nspg.in.
Tone: professional, trustworthy, simple English, business-focused.
SEO-friendly headings and page structure with target keywords.
Responsive design required for mobile and tablet.
UI theme: white background with green & blue solar palette; modern typography; clear navigation.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Solar rooftop hero illustration/photo with clean white background and green/blue accents (gkv-hero-solar.dim_1600x900.png)
- Three solar project placeholder images showing rooftop/commercial solar installations in India context (gkv-project-01.dim_1200x800.png)
- Three solar project placeholder images showing rooftop/commercial solar installations in India context (gkv-project-02.dim_1200x800.png)
- Three solar project placeholder images showing rooftop/commercial solar installations in India context (gkv-project-03.dim_1200x800.png)
- Simple modern logo mark with sun/solar motif in green & blue on transparent background (gkv-logo.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Implement the overall site shell with a consistent header navigation and footer across all pages for “GKV Smart Energy”, including a mobile-friendly navigation pattern (e.g., hamburger menu/drawer) and clear active-state indication for the current page.

Create the Home page with the specified sections and copy: hero (headline, subheading, two CTA buttons), introduction paragraph, service highlight cards (4 items), “Why Choose GKV Smart Energy” section, customer testimonials section, and footer contact details.
Create the About Us page with sections for company overview, Vision, Mission, and experience/expertise/reliability content in a professional, trustworthy tone (simple English).
Create the Services page listing the required service offerings, presented in a scannable layout (cards or sections) with short descriptions for each service.
Create the Projects / Portfolio page with a completed-project showcase including an image gallery layout and per-project info areas for project capacity and client benefits.
Create the Contact Us page with office address section, phone number, email address, a contact form (Name, Mobile, Email, Message), and a Google Map embed placeholder area.
Persist contact form submissions in the Motoko canister (single-actor backend) and wire the frontend form submit to call the backend; show a success/failure status to the user without page reload.

Apply the requested visual design system across the site: clean professional UI, white background with green & blue solar theme, modern typography, consistent spacing, and fully mobile/tablet responsive layouts.

Implement SEO-friendly on-page structure and content: semantic headings per page, keyword-aware copy where natural, and page-level metadata (title/description) for Home, About, Services, Projects, and Contact.
Generate and include solar-themed static images for the Home hero and Projects gallery, and render them as static assets in the frontend (do not serve images from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Create Home page with hero (headline/subheading), CTAs, intro, service highlight cards, Why Choose Us, testimonials, and footer contact details
Create About Us page with company overview, vision, mission, and experience/expertise/reliability content
Create Services page listing residential, commercial & industrial, installation/commissioning, maintenance & AMC, and government subsidy assistance
Create Projects/Portfolio page with completed-project showcase, image gallery layout, and project capacity/client benefits info
Create Contact Us page with address/phone/email, contact form (name, mobile, email, message), and Google Map embed placeholder
Implement clean, professional UI: white background, green & blue solar theme, modern typography, easy navigation, fully mobile/tablet responsive
Implement SEO-friendly structure and on-page content using target keywords (solar energy company, rooftop solar India, smart energy solutions)

projectName: GKV Smart Energy corporate website (5-page, responsive, SEO-friendly)
